name: Tape Collectors
description:
Hey, the web version may have sound problems, like start without the music or SFX, if it does, please consider refreshing the page or downloading the executable file available for Windows, Mac and Linux!

In tape collectors you are in control of four friendly robots that are looking for all the tapes of their favorite song, for each tape that the player collects the soundtrack gets more complex. In order to get their preferred tune complete the robots are going to face some puzzles and challenges!

The gameplay is based on a movement-recording mechanic in which you use the combination of the robot's movement to get through obstacles in the level. Be careful when making a move or you may find yourself losing some robots in the way.

Controls:

WASD or Arows - Move

SpaceBar - Jump

R - Recording 

E - Stop recording

Esc/P - Pause Menu
